title: Plagiarism Detector
accomplishments: Designed system architecture and created a stateless server using Node.js, Express.js to detect and identify plagiarism between multi-file programs using efficient structural comparison techniques
Designed algorithm to detect similarities in the code that attempts to avoid detection by performing AST transformations
Developed UI with React by considering usability heuristic principles to selectively examine and compare similarities

title: eShopR - eCommerce App
accomplishments: Designed scalable ecommerce application with a seller portal for inventory management and to analyze purchase trends
Created landing page builder using React allowing sellers to dynamically design web pages to present personalized stores
Implemented product search and recommendation using Elasticsearch to retrieve results 60% faster

title: eStock - Stock Market Trading App
accomplishments: Designed a MVC architecture by reviewing various design patterns considering the use cases to model an application for Stock Market
Developed trading, portfolio creation, quote monitoring and extended hours trading features using Java and Angular
Separated critical components into microservices and deployed to AWS supporting application with different UIs

title: eFactory - Factory Manager
accomplishments: Developed a scalable distributed client-server application for a robot factory with Primary-Backup replication protocol to improve parallelism and availability
Implemented static and dynamic load balancing techniques to efficiently distribute customer requets to different factories to facilitate High availability
Created a membership server, to allow and manage dynamic addition/removal of servers there by improving the Scalability and ensuring Fault Tolerance
